instruction: What is a major advantage of using a mobile app?
output: One major advantage of using a mobile app is that it provides easier access to content and services. With an app, users can access a wide range of content more quickly, from news to music to shopping. An app also unlocks a device's various capabilities, allowing for faster and more reliable service. Additionally, mobile apps provide users with the convenience of always having their favorite services and content available on-the-go.
